plot: Three friends have been stuck in their East coast fishing community forever. No matter how badly they want to leave for the big city there is always something tying them down.
plot_en: Three friends have been stuck in their East coast fishing community forever. No matter how badly they want to leave for the big city there is always something tying them down.
plot_es: Three friends have been stuck in their East coast fishing community forever. No matter how badly they want to leave for the big city there is always something tying them down.
title: Townies
